text: Pelagio Antonio de Labastida y Dávalos(March 21, 1816, Zamora, Michoacán — February 4, 1891, Oacalco, Morelos) was a Mexican Roman Catholic prelate, lawyer and doctor of canon law, and politician. He was a member of the imperial regency that invited Maximilian of Austria to accept the throne of Mexico. Category:1816 births Category:1891 deaths Category:Mexican politicians Category:Mexican Roman Catholic priests
title: Pelagio Antonio de Labastida y Dávalos
